General.Name: Tai Twun Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Tai Twun Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic components comprising electronic and communication terminals and connectors. The company offers cooler and heat pipe components; single card, IO, FPC, board, and battery connectors; and other components that are used in NB PC, mobile phone, 3.5G HSDPA, MFP printer, DVD, and LCD TV applications. It also provides consumer electronics products, such as AC USB adaptors, car chargers, and USB card readers. Tai Twun Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 880, Chung Cheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23586
